name: There's Something Fishy About This
description:
Rule the sea by becoming the biggest fish!

Eat smaller fish and avoid bigger fish.

Instructions:

Xbox Controller Required to play

Right Stick to move

A to Dash

Credits:

Vilius Drumsta - Programming

Dónall O'Donoghue - Sound + Music

Rob Coll - Art, Programming

Made during The Mega Gamecraft Showdown in 1 day
